11#ifndef API_AUDIO_CODECS_G711_AUDIO_DECODER_G711_H_
12#define API_AUDIO_CODECS_G711_AUDIO_DECODER_G711_H_
13
14#include <memory>
15#include <vector>
16
17#include "absl/types/optional.h"
18#include "api/audio_codecs/audio_codec_pair_id.h"
19#include "api/audio_codecs/audio_decoder.h"
20#include "api/audio_codecs/audio_format.h"
21#include "rtc_base/system/rtc_export.h"
22
23namespace webrtc {
24
25// G711 decoder API for use as a template parameter to
26// CreateAudioDecoderFactory<...>().
27struct RTC_EXPORT AudioDecoderG711 {
28 struct Config {
29 enum class Type { kPcmU, kPcmA };
30 bool IsOk() const {
31 return (type == Type::kPcmU || type == Type::kPcmA) && num_channels >= 1;
32 }
33 Type type;
34 int num_channels;
35 };
36 static absl::optional<Config> SdpToConfig(const SdpAudioFormat& audio_format);
37 static void AppendSupportedDecoders(std::vector<AudioCodecSpec>* specs);
38 static std::unique_ptr<AudioDecoder> MakeAudioDecoder(
39 const Config& config,
40 absl::optional<AudioCodecPairId> codec_pair_id = absl::nullopt);
41};
42
43} // namespace webrtc
44
45#endif // API_AUDIO_CODECS_G711_AUDIO_DECODER_G711_H_
46
